title: DragonDefender Spam/Imposter Killer
description: Scam & Imposters are everywhere on YouTube. People are losing millions to these nasty people. It is clear Google needs help in this fight
solution: Dragon Defender is an automatic scalable system that has been fighting spam for 10 months with a selected no. of Cardano YouTube Channels.
experience: I have been building distributed, automated systems for over 20 years and have lots of experience fighting YouTube and other socials spam.
